resources.string: This study investigates the impact of using context-aware implementation intention (IF THEN plan) on mood reporting task. Research has shown that planning is more effective if you first identify a particular situation (IF), and decide on a goal for what you will do in that situation (THEN).

You will be given an IF THEN plan: \"IF it is in the evening, THEN I will complete the mood questionnaires.\" After a week, the app will ask you to specify the IF condition to be more specific that suits your availability. For example by specifying the time, location, and your activity.
After a week, the app will start sending you a daily reminder to complete the questionnaires when the specified condition is detected.
We need you to grant a permission for location request in order to get an appropriate context of your specified condition.
